name: Mariana's Trench
description:
Game made in a couple of days for Ludum Dare 48. The theme is deeper and deeper.

You're a researcher sent to the bottom of the ocean, in the Mariana's Trench, to discover what you can about the mysterious creatures that inhabit the place.

Move with WASD, confirm with SHIFT, jump with SPACEBAR. Mouse is required for shooting and for the scanner levels.

Hope you enjoy it!
